title: Root Cause Analysis (Fishbone Diagram)
description: For a stated problem ('Decline in Product Quality'), an agent must create a Fishbone (Ishikawa) diagram to brainstorm potential causes.

tasks.description: For the 'Manpower' category, brainstorm potential causes (e.g., 'insufficient training', 'low morale').
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates relevant potential causes related to people.

tasks.description: For the 'Method' category, brainstorm potential causes (e.g., 'outdated procedures', 'no quality checks').
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates relevant potential causes related to processes.

tasks.description: For the 'Machine' and 'Material' categories, brainstorm other potential causes.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates relevant potential causes for the remaining categories.

tasks.description: Assemble the brainstormed ideas into a structured Fishbone diagram.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a correctly formatted diagram.
